definition: hair/feather/down/wool/mildew/mold/coarse or semifinished/young/raw/careless/unthinking/nervous/scared/(of currency) to devalue or depreciate/classifier for Chinese fractional monetary unit ( = 角[jiao3] , = one-tenth of a yuan or 10 fen 分[fen1])
lower form of animal life, including insects, insect larvae, worms and similar creatures/CL:條|条[tiao2],隻|只[zhi1]/(fig.) person with a particular undesirable characteristic

sentences.english: And rural villagers in southern Africa harvest caterpillars from the local mopane trees.
sentences.chinese: 南非的一些农业村庄也从可乐豆木上收获毛虫。
毛虫在成年期会变成蝴蝶。

sentences.english: He was a big, fat caterpillar.
sentences.chinese: 它是一条胖嘟嘟的大毛虫了。

sentences.english: Trypanosoma brucei is the hemoflagellate that causes sleeping sickness.
sentences.chinese: 布氏锥虫是一种造成嗜睡症的血鞭毛虫。

sentences.english: The caterpillar looks like its dad, don’t you think?
sentences.chinese: 下图是它的毛虫，看起来老的像它爹，你不觉得吗？

sentences.english: Faldan could see that, in fact, the tree was full of small, hungry caterpillars.
sentences.chinese: 福达果真看到树上爬满了瘦小而饥饿的毛毛虫。

sentences.english: It need not add pancreatin to separate the somatic cells of Trichinella spiralis.
sentences.chinese: 旋毛虫的体细胞分离，可以不用加胰酶消化。

sentences.english: Larvae – Woolly bear caterpillars curl up in thick layers of leaf litter for winter.
sentences.chinese: 幼虫期灯蛾毛虫在冬天会裹在厚厚几层的落叶中。
吃香肠会引发旋毛虫病。

sentences.english: Tent caterpillars feed on cherry tree leaves.
sentences.chinese: 帐篷毛虫食用樱桃树叶。

sentences.english: The caterpillar will eventually metamorphose into a butterfly .
sentences.chinese: 毛毛虫最终将蜕变成一只蝴蝶。

sentences.english: They bite their way out of the caterpillar and begin spinning cocoons.
sentences.chinese: 然后它们会寻路冲破毛毛虫体外开始做茧。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the methods for separating somatic cells of Trichinella spiralis and the determination of their activity.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨旋毛虫体细胞的分离方法和活性检测。

sentences.english: Blepharisma is thought to be a relatively primitive genus in the phylum Ciliophora.
sentences.chinese: 赭纤虫被认为是一类进化过程中较为原始的纤毛虫。

sentences.english: Finally, man has helped out the dinoflagellates.
sentences.chinese: 最后是人类帮助腰鞭毛虫摆脱了困境。

definition: (of spiders, caterpillars, silkworms etc) to extrude silk
a slug/sb with a runny nose
